thread.title: RUMOURS: Arsenal and Man Utd fall behind RB Leipzig in Upamecano race
thread.title_full: RUMOURS: Arsenal and Man Utd fall behind RB Leipzig in Upamecano race

title: RUMOURS: Arsenal and Man Utd fall behind RB Leipzig in Upamecano race
text:
0 Jan 10, 2017 08:27:58 The rival Premier League title hopefuls are set to miss out on the highly rated full-back, with the Frenchman poised to leave Red Bull Salzburg for the Bundesliga 
Manchester United and Arsenal are set to miss out to RB Leipzig in the battle to land Red Bull Salzburg defender Dayot Upamecano, according to the Daily Mirror . 
Messi statue destroyed by vandals 
The Premier League title hopefuls, along with La Liga giants Barcelona, have had the French teenager scouted on several occasions this season. 
They have, however, fallen behind Leipzig in the race for his signature, with a Â£10 million move to Germany close to completion. 
It is understood that the relationship between Salzburg and their fellow Red Bull-owned outfit has helped to swing things in the Bundesliga club's favour.
